message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the opportunity to purchase your product. I understand its value, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you seeing the value in the product.  To be frank, $9,000 is quite a bit below what I'm looking for. Could you do $12,500?
Hello Alice, I've given your offer some thought. Unfortunately, I still can't meet your price. I would like to offer $10,000 for the product.
